original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā vesāliyaṁ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṁ.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā vesāliyam viharati mahā vane kūṭāgāra sālāya

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū suddhakāḷakānaṁ eḷakalomānaṁ santhataṁ kārāpenti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū suddha kāḷakānam eḷaka lomānam santhatam kārāpenti

original: Manussā vihāracārikaṁ āhiṇḍantā passitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: manussā vihāra cārikam āhiṇḍantā passitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā suddhakāḷakānaṁ eḷakalomānaṁ santhataṁ kārāpessanti, seyyathāpi gihī kāmabhogino”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā suddha kāḷakānam eḷaka lomānam santhatam kārāpessanti sā iyyathā api gihī kāma bhoginā iti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhū tesam manussānam ujjhāyantānam khiyyantānam vipācentāna

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū suddhakāḷakānaṁ eḷakalomānaṁ santhataṁ kārāpessantī”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū suddha kāḷakānam eḷaka lomānam santhatam kārāpessanti iti

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū chabbaggiye bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū chabbaggiye bhikkhū aneka pariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etam attham ārocesuṃ pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, suddhakāḷakānaṁ eḷakalomānaṁ santhataṁ kārāpethā”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tumhe bhikkhave suddha kāḷakānam eḷaka lomānam santhatam kārāpetha ati

original: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, suddhakāḷakānaṁ eḷakalomānaṁ santhataṁ kārāpessatha.
analyzed: katham hi nāma tumhe mogha purisāḥ suddha kāḷakānam eḷaka lomānam santhatam kārāpessatha
neta moghapurisāḥ appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu suddhakāḷakānaṁ eḷakalomānaṁ santhataṁ kārāpeyya, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu suddha kāḷakānam eḷaka lomānam santhatam kārāpeyya nissaggiyam pācittiyanti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetaḥ bhikkhu iti

original: karoti vā kārāpeti vā, payoge dukkaṭaṁ.
Nissajjitabbaṁ saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā.
analyzed: nissajjitabbam saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā

original: “idaṁ me, bhante, suddhakāḷakānaṁ eḷakalomānaṁ santhataṁ kārāpitaṁ nissaggiyaṁ.
analyzed: idam me bhante suddha kāḷakānam eḷaka lomānam santhatam kārāpitam nissaggiya
imā aham saṅghassa nissajjāmi iti pe

original: Attanā vippakataṁ attanā pariyosāpeti, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
analyzed: attanā vippakatam attanā pariyosāpeti nissaggiyam pācittiya

original: Attanā vippakataṁ parehi pariyosāpeti, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
analyzed: attanā vippakatam parehi pariyosāpeti nissaggiyam pācittiya

original: Parehi vippakataṁ attanā pariyosāpeti, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
analyzed: parehi vippakatam attanā pariyosāpeti nissaggiyam pācittiya

original: Parehi vippakataṁ parehi pariyosāpeti, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
analyzed: parehi vippakatam parehi pariyosāpeti nissaggiyam pācittiya

original: Aññassatthāya karoti vā kārāpeti vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: aññassa atthāya karoti vā kārāpeti vā āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Aññena kataṁ paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: aññena katam paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjati āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: vitānaṁ vā bhūmattharaṇaṁ vā sāṇipākāraṁ vā bhisiṁ vā bibbohanaṁ vā karoti,
analyzed: vitānam vā bhūmattharaṇam vā sāṇi pākāram vā bhisim vā bibbohanam vā karoti
